name: "The Surreal Life"  Season 2 Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of the cast members did NOT hang out with the others on the first day of the show?
questions.explanation:
Traci.

	Traci Bingham was shooting an episode for a television show and did not meet up with the gang until the end of the first evening.

questions.text: Which of the cast members really likes to drink a lot?
questions.explanation:
Trishelle.

	Trishelle is stated in the opening credits as liking to drink a lot and that everyone probably thinks she is a easy.

questions.text: Trishelle, Traci, and Rob all share a bedroom in the room with red and white checks all over the walls.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Trishelle, Traci, and Ron all share that room together.  Traci was disgusted by the smell of Ron Jeremy's things the first night that she arrived at the house.

questions.text: Which of the following condiments did Rob (Vanilla Ice) break into the pantry to get to put on his food?
questions.explanation:
Sugar and Salt.

	Rob threw a big old fit because he had to have sugar and salt for his food.

questions.text: Which of the following cast members is a big time vegetarian?
questions.explanation:
Traci.

	Traci gave Erik and Rob a lecture at the barbecue about eating animals and how horrible she thought that they were.

questions.text: Whose idea was it for the barbecue after Tammy Faye's book signing?
questions.explanation:
Ron.

	Ron invited a bunch of his porno industry friends.  They got a little wild for Tammy Faye who left the party early and went to bed.

questions.text: Ron Jeremy set it up so that Rob (Vanilla Ice) could meet which of the following music icons?
questions.explanation:
Rick James.

	Rob had idolized Rick James.  Ron told him that he was a friend and invited him to come over so they could meet.  Rick said something that offended Ice, but he bit his tongue because he was his idol after all.

questions.text: Which cast member refused to hear any readings from the psychic?
questions.explanation:
Tammy Faye.

	She didn't believe in it and felt it went against her beliefs so she choose not to have a reading.

questions.text: What dessert did the cast members make for their neighbors?
questions.explanation:
Brownies.

	They were sent around the neighborhood to get acquainted with the neighbors.  Some welcomed them and some did not.

questions.text: Which 80's television star organized the charity event that the cast took part in at Mel's Diner?
questions.explanation:
Gary Coleman.

	Gary Coleman got so furious with Rob that he ended up leaving in a taxi.
